translation:
My Most Excellent Sá Brito, in the attached letter that Your Lordship Your Excellency Your Excellency Your Excellency From Your Excellency Almeida Piratini, January 19, 1839.

I send the Manifesto. Regarding Maia's request, I suppose it is the case, however Your Excellency Sá Brito has not read it as I am arranging travel. B. G. Silva.
